name: EpilepsyICD10CM
title: Epilepsy (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Intent of this data element is to identity diagnostic codes that are indicative of epilepsy),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Patients with a diagnosis of epilepsy),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude Unspecified seizure diagnostic codes.)
